name: Penablerized
body:
# Building the penablerized screen

So I had this old HP Compaq tc4400 lying around at home. This laptop was my workhorse during university, but after 8 years it has lost its battery life.

The tc4400 uses a Wacom Penabled Digitizer.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
